title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point for stating that the trend lines were similar or slightly increasing.

Two points for comparing how the trend lines for East Asia and Europe were similar by referencing the graph.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point for stating that mechanization and irrigation improved farming practices and/or higher wheat yields in South Asia.

Two points for explaining how mechanization and irrigation impacted wheat farming in South Asia.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point for stating that the Green Revolution increased wheat yields in Africa and East Asia or East Asian countries increased higher yields than Africa.

Two points for explaining how the Green Revolution impacted farming in African countries relative to agriculture in East Asian countries.

The response correctly explains one of the following ways that the Green Revolution impacted farming in African countries relative to agriculture in East Asian countries:

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point for stating that the fertility rate declines as wheat yields increased.

Two points for explaining how fertility rates declined as wheat yield production increased.
